column1: andaaz kissi se tum pyar karo
bade miyan chote miyan kisi disco mein jaaye
chhoti bahen jaoo kahan bataye dil
mere jeevan saathi dil ke chain
pardes do dil mile rahe hain
quayamat se quayamat tak aye mere hum safar
rehna hai tere mein ae bolo bolo
rehna hai tere mein zara zara
roja bharat humko jaan se pyara hai
